title: Library of Economic Possibility
lede: Design and development of the brand and website for the Library of Economic Possibility. Built in collaboration with founders Kasey Klimes and Oshan Jarrow.

assets.alt: Overview of the Library of Economic Possibility desktop website.
Marginalia card for the Library of Economic Possibility articles.
Brand typography system for the Library of Economic Possibility.

body.raw:
<MediaDialogVideo
  showBorder
  aspect="2074-1440"
  src="https://cdn.callumflack.design/The_Library_of_Economic_Possibility_home_page_4_November_2022.mp4"
  poster="/images/lep-overview-poster-1600-1000.jpg"
  alt="Overview of the Library of Economic Possibility desktop website."
/>

The Library of Economic Possibility connects economic knowledge across society's concerns. Their mission is to provide the website as a knowledge tool to improve the quality of discourse in order to foster the next economy.

I designed and built the site and developed a graphic brand system in collaboration with founders [Kasey Klimes](https://www.kaseyklimes.com/) and [Oshan Jarrow](https://www.musingmind.org/) over an 18 month period starting 2021.

At the time, I was very interested in ways of enhancing bodies of text with "at hand" pathways to enhance citations, hyperlinks and other appropriate metadata. The marginalia card I designed and built here is a solid example of this.

<MediaDialogVideo
  showBorder
  aspect="1728-1080"
  src="https://cfd-media.b-cdn.net/lep-article-240722.mp4"
  poster="/images/lep-article-poster-1600-1000.jpg"
  alt="Marginalia card for the Library of Economic Possibility articles."
/>

The knowledge system itself was made up of a five building blocks: reports, insights, sources, authors and tagsâ€”all bi-directionally linked to create pathways between them.

<MediaDialogVideo
  showBorder
  aspect="1728-1080"
  src="https://cfd-media.b-cdn.net/lep-knowledge-system.mp4"
  poster="/images/lep-knowledge-system-poster-1600-1000.jpg"
  alt="Bi-directional knowledge system for the Library of Economic Possibility."
  caption="Bi-directional knowledge system for the Library of Economic Possibility."
/>

The design system range of typography, colors and iconography all grew from a classic logotype using [Klim](https://klim.co.nz/)'s Heldane serif.

<MediaDialogImage
  showBorder
  src="/images/lep-brand-clean-1600-1000.jpg"
  alt="Brand typography system for the Library of Economic Possibility."
  aspect="1600-1000"
  height={1000}
  width={1600}
  caption="Brand typography system for the Library of Economic Possibility."
/>

Visit the [Library of Economic Possibility](https://www.economicpossibility.org/).
